This is the Manual and Dictionary of SMART for Health - Rangers.

To view the definition of an Attribute or Option in particular, please select the appropriate language on left, click on "Dictionary SMART for Health - Rangers" and then select the Category containing the Attribute(s) and the Option(s) to check from the menu on the right.
